questions.question: 1. Which of the following should be counted in Hong Kong’s GDP in 2018?

choices.answer: The value of a newly issued government bond in 2018
The earnings of an agent from selling an old flat for his client
The gain from selling a share of a listed company

questions.question: 2. Which of the following would NOT be included in the calculation of Hong Kong’s GDP?

choices.answer: The salary earned by a foreign domestic helper who has worked in Hong Kong
The profits of second-hand shop from reselling iPhones
The commission from providing securities trading services
The value of potatoes grown by a household for its own consumption

questions.question: 3.* Which of the following is NOT included in Hong Kong’s GDP at market prices?

choices.answer: A gift cheque purchased from a shop
Estimated rent of an owner-occupied residential unit
Stamp duty paid on the transaction of premises
The value of unsold textbooks printed during the period
